title: TareUhhhhhh Gaming
teaser: Theming Project designed to put together a cohesive site after doing market research into a chosen industry.
description: I chose to create a website for a video game developer. As an avid gamer myself, a video game theme was the natural choice for me. I narrowed down 4 websites that had aspects that caught my eye and emulated that through colors, line quality and font choice.

modules.title: Project Info
paragraph: This project was an exercise in combining as many development ideas I had learned up to this point.

modules.title: Inspiration
paragraph: This project was an exercise in emulating a theme. I like playing video games, specifically I really enjoy horror games, so I researched video game companies that specialize in that genre. I studied them and looked for any similarities and repeated elements.

modules.caption: This caption goes with the image.

title: Exercises For Programmers
teaser: A collection of exercises from the book of the same name by Brian Hogan.
description: Brian Hogan's book Exercises For Programmers has a wide variety of exercises for all skill levels and any language. It has been a great tool for me to practice my skills across multiple languages.

title: Responsive Layout Garden
description: In an effort to truly master building responsive sites and modules, I have cultivated a garden of various layouts that will look their best on screens of all sizes.

modules.title: Text Content Module
paragraph: This would be a paragraph that is typed into the json file.
There can be multiple paragraphs, as I made an array and a foreach loop to filter in as many paragraphs as necessary.
